thread.title: Friend of church massacre suspect receives lower bond

title: Friend of church massacre suspect receives lower bond
text:
Published By: Charlotte Observer - Today 
A nonviolent past and lack of hard drug use were factors cited by a judge who lowered bond for a man accused of failing to tell authorities ...
